content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I understand you need electrical work done. I'd be happy to help schedule an appointment. Could I start by getting your full name, please?
Thank you, Robert. Could you please provide the address where the electrical work is to be done?
Great, thanks for that information. Let me quickly verify that we service your area.
Good news, we do cover your service area, Robert. When would be an ideal time for our technician to visit?
Honestly, I'm not sure right this very minute. I don't have my calendar nearby. Can I get back to you shortly on a good time?
Of course, Robert. Please take your time. Just let us know when you're ready to schedule your appointment. We'll be here to help!
Actually, I think I will call back later once I have my calendar. Thanks.
reason: Customer chose to not continue scheduling
